articles.title: See winning numbers for Mega Millions July 28 jackpot - USA TODAY
articles.description: There have been no Mega Millions jackpot winners since April, and thus the lottery's grand prize continues to grow.
articles.content:
The Mega Millions jackpot sits at an estimated $910 million with a $472.5 million cash option, the fifth-largest prize in the lottery's history.

articles.title: Scientists Discover The Genetic Switch to Induce 'Virgin Births' in Fruit Flies - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Scientists said on Friday they have genetically engineered female fruit flies that can have offspring without needing a male, marking the first time 'virgin birth" has been induced in an animal.
